data.name: Himno - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Words are unnecessary. Just sit back, relax and immerse yourself in this peaceful world listening to the soothing melodies of the Himno official soundtrack. Containing 14 original musical tracks.

Original soundtrack:
1. Ignite torch
2. Enter new district
3. Zone above 600 meters
4. Open pot
5. Pick xp gems
6. Discover foundations
7. Release Wisp
8. Checkpoint
9. Bush Butterflies appear
10. Reach district 11
11. Level Up
12. Drop to the sea
13. Touch Tomb
14. Touch sculpture

Music files can be found within the installation directory of the game in the Soundtrack folder. All tracks are mp3 format.

data.short_description: Words are unnecessary. Just sit back, relax and immerse yourself in this peaceful world listening to the soothing melodies of the Himno official soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
